name: CatTheme
0:
”Alexa, start Cat Theme”
”Alexa, launch Cat Theme”
”Alexa, enable Cat Theme”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cat theme
des:
Alexa’s Cat theme adds some cat fun to the Alexa experiences you use daily. When you ask for things like the weather, timers, alarms, and jokes, Alexa will add some cat sounds to the responses. If you’ve got an Echo Show, you’ll also experience delightful cat pics. To get started say, “Alexa, enable Cat theme”.

So you know, the Cat theme doesn’t transform every aspect of your Alexa experience. To turn off the Cat theme just say, “Alexa, disable cat theme.” 

THINGS TO TRY:
Alexa, what's the weather?
Alexa, set a 9:00 AM alarm
Alexa, set a 10-minute timer
Alexa, hello
Alexa, good morning
Alexa, how are you?
Alexa, thank you
Alexa, goodbye
Alexa, good night
Alexa, sing a cat song
Alexa, sing happy birthday to my cat
Alexa, tell me a cat joke
 Alexa, play relaxing cat music 


THINGS WE WANT YOU TO KNOW:
Cat theme is not available on Kids Edition Echo devices or Echo devices that are set in Kids Mode.
